meanings.definition: Capable of being changed or altered
meanings.sent1: The weather in our city is mutably unpredictable.
meanings.sent2: Her mood was mutably shifting throughout the day.
meanings.sent3: The mutably colored chameleon blended perfectly with the leaves.
meanings.sent4: The mutably changing skyline of the city never fails to impress.
meanings.sent5: The mutably shifting sands of the desert create a mesmerizing landscape.

meanings.sent1: The stock market is mutably influenced by various factors.
meanings.sent2: The mutably changing seasons bring different colors to the landscape.
meanings.sent3: His mutably evolving fashion sense always surprises his friends.
meanings.sent4: The mutably shifting opinions of the public can sway elections.
meanings.sent5: The mutably fluctuating prices of gold make it a risky investment.
